  groups:
  - gid: 1042
    name: operators
  - gid: 1313
    name: kiosk
  users:

    expires: "2050-05-13"
    gid: 1001
    groups:
    - wheel
    - operators
    home: /home/lzap
    name: lzap
    password: $1$yLbp23ib$BNYcV9CQV17e1460PNrVe.
    shell: /usr/bin/bash
    ssh_keys:
    - ssh-key 1234
    uid: 1001
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    name: dash-allowed
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    name: underscore_allowed
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    name: dot.allowed
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    name: .head-dot-allowed-too
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    name: "123456789"
  - expires: "1970-01-01"
    name: trailing-dollar-for-samba$
name: 'Blueprint example: accounts'
storage:
  partitions: null
  type: gpt
